info.description: Here you can find all the API calls and models that are available in TerrariumPI. More information can be found at https://theyosh.github.io/TerrariumPI/
info.title: TerrariumPI REST API

tags.name: Button
tags.description: Buttons, motion detectors and light sensors

get.summary: Get available area types
get.description: Get all the available area types with supported sensor types.

200.description: Zero or more area types with supported sensor types.

get.summary: Get existing areas
get.description: Get all the existing areas in a list.

post.summary: Add a new area to an enclosure
post.description: Add a new area to an enclosure. The enclosure needs to be existing

get.summary: Get a specific area
get.description: Get a specific area selected by id

put.summary: Update an existing area with new data
put.description: Update an existing area with new data. The enclosure needs to be existing

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Update the values that need to be changed

get.summary: Get a list of supported soundcards
get.description: Get all the supported soundcards

get.summary: Get a list of existing audio files
get.description: Get all the existing audio files

get.summary: Get an existing audio file
get.description: Get an existing audio file based on ID

200.description: The requested audio file is deleted

get.summary: Get a list of supported buttons
get.description: Get all the supported buttons

get.summary: Get a list of existing buttons
get.description: Get all the existing buttons

get.summary: Get a specific button
get.description: Get a specific button selected by id

put.summary: Update an existing button with new data
put.description: Update an existing button with new data.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Update the values that need to be changed

get.summary: Get the history for a specific button for a period of 1 day
get.description: Get the history for a specific button for a period of 1 day

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of button for which to get the history

get.summary: Get the history for a specific button for a period
get.description: Get the history for a specific button for a period

get.summary: Get existing calendars
get.description: Get all the existing calendars in a list.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start date and time for calendar items

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: End date and time for calendar items

get.summary: Get a specific calendar
get.description: Get a specific calendar selected by id

put.summary: Update an existing calendar with new data
put.description: Update an existing calendar with new data. The enclosure needs to be existing

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Update the values that need to be changed

get.summary: Download iCal
get.description: Download iCal

get.summary: Get a list of existing enclosures
get.description: Get all the existing enclosures

get.summary: Get a specific enclosure
get.description: Get a specific enclosure selected by id

put.summary: Update an existing enclosure with new data
put.description: Update an existing enclosure with new data.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Update the values that need to be changed

get.summary: Download the logfile
get.description: Download the logfile

200.description: Get the logfile in plain text

get.summary: Get a list of existing playlists
get.description: Get all the existing playlists

get.summary: Get a specific playlist
get.description: Get a specific playlist selected by id

put.summary: Update an existing playlist with new data
put.description: Update an existing playlist with new data.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Update the values that need to be changed

get.summary: Get a list of supported relays
get.description: Get all the supported relays

200.description: Found zero or more new relays

get.summary: Get a list of existing relays
get.description: Get all the existing relays

get.summary: Get a specific relay
get.description: Get a specific relay selected by id

put.summary: Update an existing relay with new data
put.description: Update an existing relay with new data.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Update the values that need to be changed

get.summary: Get the history for a specific relay for a period of 1 day
get.description: Get the history for a specific relay for a period of 1 day

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of relay for which to get the history

get.summary: Get the history for a specific relay for a period
get.description: Get the history for a specific relay for a period

get.summary: Get the export for a specific relay for a period of 1 day
get.description: Get the export for a specific relay for a period of 1 day

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of relay for which to get the export

get.summary: Get the export for a specific relay for a period
get.description: Get the export for a specific relay for a period

post.description: Change the state of the relay. Action 0-100 means you can use a value between 0 and 100 if it is a dimmer. Manual is used for setting the relay in manual mode. Replaced is used to mark the date in the calendar for reminding for next time.

get.summary: Get a list of supported sensors
get.description: Get all the supported sensors

get.summary: Scan for new sensors
get.description: Scan for new sensors. Not all sensors have auto discovery.

200.description: Found zero or more new sensors

get.summary: Get a list of existing sensors
get.description: Get all the existing sensors

get.summary: Get a specific sensor
get.description: Get a specific sensor selected by id

put.summary: Update an existing sensor with new data
put.description: Update an existing sensor with new data.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Update the values that need to be changed

get.summary: Get all sensor of {type}
get.description: Get all sensor of a specified type

get.summary: Get the history for a specific sensor or sensor type.
get.description: Get the history for a specific sensor or sensor type for a period of 1 day. When using a sensor type, the values will be averages of all sensor of the selected type.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Either a sensor ID or sensor type can be used as filter

get.summary: Get the history for a specific sensor or sensor type.
get.description: Get the history for a specific sensor or sensor type for a period of {period}. When using a sensor type, the values will be averages of all sensor of the selected type.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Either a sensor ID or sensor type can be used as filter

get.summary: Get the export for a specific sensor or sensor type.
get.description: Get the export for a specific sensor or sensor type for a period of 1 day. When using a sensor type, the values will be averages of all sensor of the selected type.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Either a sensor ID or sensor type can be used as filter

get.summary: Get the export for a specific sensor or sensor type.
get.description: Get the export for a specific sensor or sensor type for a period of {period}. When using a sensor type, the values will be averages of all sensor of the selected type.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Either a sensor ID or sensor type can be used as filter

get.summary: Get the current state
get.description: Get the current state of the system.

get.summary: Get all settings
get.description: Get all settings in an list. Password setting will be skipped.

put.description: Update multiple settings in one action. Non existing setting ids will be ignored.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: All settings to change in one action

get.summary: Get a setting
get.description: Get a single setting based on ID

put.description: Update a single setting based on ID

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Update the values that need to be changed

get.summary: Get weather data
get.description: Get weather data

get.summary: Get weather temperature forecast
get.description: Get weather temperature forecast

Basic.description: Basic HTTP authentication. Default user is "admin". You can change this in the settings.

message.description: Holds the return message from the server
